title: ranganAyaka svAmi
sahitya:
ranganAyaka svmi rAjIvalOcana beLagAyitELennuta angane 
lakumi tA patiyanebbisidaLu shrngArada nidre sAkennuta


caraNam 1    pakSirAjanu bandu bAgiLoLage nindu akSiteredu bEga IkSisemba 
pakSi jAtigaLella cilipili guTTuda sUkSmadali ninnanu smarisuvuvO krSNa
    caraNam 2    sanaka sanandana sanatsujAtaru bandu vinayadi kai mugidu Olaiparu 
ghana suka shaunaka vyAsa vAlmIkaru nenedu koNDADuvaro hariyE
    caraNam 3    suraru kinnararu kimpuruSaru uragaru paripariyali ninna smsrisuvaru 
araNanu bandu dayAcaladali ninda kiraNa tOruva bhAskaranu shrI hariyE
    caraNam 4    padumanAbhane ninna nAmAmrtavanu padumAkSiyaru tamma maneyoLage 
udayadoLeddu savidADuta pADuta dadhiya kaDevarELu madhusUdana krSNa
    caraNam 5    muramathanane ninna caraNada sEveya karuNisa bEkendu teruNiyaru 
paripariyindali smarisi hAraiparu purandara viTTala nInELo hariyE
